text: The 2013–14 SV Darmstadt 98 season was the club's 116th season. This was the club's 3rd season in the 3. Liga overall and since promotion. ==Background== SV Darmstadt 98 played their 3rd season in the new formed 3. Liga after having escaped relegation due to local rivals Kickers Offenbach having their licence revoked due to insolvency. ==References== Category:SV Darmstadt 98 seasons Darmstadt
title: 2013–14 SV Darmstadt 98 season
